name: Call of the Haunted (Skill Card)
skill_activation:
At the start of the Duel, place this card in your center Spell & Trap Zone.
You cannot activate this Skill during your first turn of the Duel.
You draw 1 less card at the beginning of the Duel.
skill_effect:
Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position.
When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.
